abstract_summ: In this paper, we investigate the ongoing dynamics of COVID-19 in India after its emergence in Wuhan, China in December 2019 . We discuss the effect of nationwide lockdown implemented in India on March 25, 2020 to prevent the spread of the virus . Our model predicts that with the ongoing lockdown, the peak of active infected cases around 43,000 will occur in the mid of May, 2020 .
